label: gladius
description: A short sword of ancient design. Good for stabbing or slashing.

label: longsword
description: The ancient weapon of kings, the longsword can be used for slashing or stabbing and is deadly in the right hands.

label: knife
description: One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon.

label: spear
description: A polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents in melee combat.

label: mace
description: A refined club, engineered for efficient swinging and deadly impacts.

label: club
description: The oldest human weapon - a shaped stick, heavy at one end, for bashing enemies to death. Primitive but effective.
